inclusion.criterion: The patient has a diagnosis of asthma as defined by the NIH.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: The patient is a male or female 12 years of age or older as of the visit when informed consent/assent is signed (screening or prescreening visit, as applicable).
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: The patient is able to perform acceptable and repeatable spirometry.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: The patient is able to use an electronic diary after training.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: If female, patient is currently not pregnant, not breast feeding, nor attempting to become pregnant (for 30 days before the screening visit (SV) and throughout the duration of the study and for 30 days after patient's last study visit) or, is of childbearing potential and not sexually active, has a negative urine pregnancy test, and is willing to commit to using a consistent and acceptable method of birth control.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: The patient does not have any concomitant conditions or treatments that could interfere with study conduct, influence the interpretation of study observations/results, or put the patient at increased risk during the study as judged by the investigator.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: The patient/parent/legal guardian is capable of understanding the requirements, risks, and benefits of study participation, and, as judged by the investigator, capable of giving informed consent/assent and being compliant with all study requirements (eg, dose schedules, visit schedules, procedures, and record keeping).
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: The patient, as judged by the investigator, is able to discontinue all asthma medications at the SV.
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Life-threatening asthma, defined as a history of asthma episode(s) requiring intubation and/or associated with hypercapnea, respiratory arrest or hypoxic seizures, asthma-related syncopal episode(s), or hospitalizations within the past year.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: The patient received systemic corticosteroids within 30 days before the SV (for asthma exacerbation or for other indications).
exclusion.label: not_met
